ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Timorous Deep Question
ygData.msgSnippet: Oooh don t I wish ;-) Someone once claimed to be able to do this, but Verant stated they were blowing smoke.  However, those lucky casters that bound
ygData.messageBody:
Oooh don't I wish ;-)
Someone once claimed to be able to do this, but Verant stated they were
blowing smoke. However, those lucky casters that bound themselves inside
the room can freely gate and tp to any city in the game. My merchant
shaman, lvl 14 camped on the elf island the day before they changed it, I
was too tired to make the swim. ;-(

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Daryl Schwemley [mailto:drs@...]
Sent: Wednesday, July 19, 2000 2:37 PM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Timorous Deep Question


Ahh... so deeper into Kunark is what you meant. I was thinking you had
figured out how to go from the firepots in the various towns to the firepot
room in Timorous and just weren't sharing. ;)

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, July 19, 2000 3:28 PM
> To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Timorous Deep Question
>
>
> Invis and jump in the Cabilis pot and then be prepared to run
> like hell!
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Daryl Schwemley [mailto:drs@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, July 19, 2000 2:27 PM
> To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Timorous Deep Question
>
>
> Umm... how do you use the firepot for going TO Kunark? I
> thought they were
> one-way (outgoing only).
>
> Gilgurth
> Charming Fool of 28 Winces
> E'ci
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Reeves, Patrick W [mailto:pwr3@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, July 19, 2000 3:15 PM
> To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Timorous Deep Question
>
>
> I have used the firepots about a dozen times without a
> problem, going to and
> from Kunark.
>
> Rokenn
>
>
